ALEGRIA XXII isn't just a property purchase; it's an investment in a proven, thriving Mediterranean lifestyle backed by decades of construction excellence.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the beating heart of Spain's most welcoming coastal community. This sought-after neighborhood offers an unmatched combination of urban convenience and beach proximity, attracting international families, retirees, and investors worldwide. The area seamlessly blends traditional Spanish charm with modern amenities, featuring excellent shopping at Mercadona and Carrefour, authentic local restaurants, and world-class healthcare facilities. Living in Centro means genuine integration into a thriving expat community where English is spoken everywhere, yet authentic Spanish culture remains vibrant and accessible. The neighborhood is walkable, safe, and perfectly positioned between Torrevieja's beautiful beaches and the renowned golf courses of the Costa Blanca. With 30 minutes to Alicante Airport, direct bus connections throughout Spain, and proximity to both natural and cultural attractions, Centro offers the ideal balance for those seeking Mediterranean living without sacrificing modern conveniences or international connectivity.
